sources.title: Camouflage (2001) - Full Movie
sources.description:
An unemployed actor with an interest in detective work takes a job with an experienced private investigator, (Leslie Nielsen, 'The Naked Gun') in an attempt to foil a murder plot.

#freemovies #moviesondemand #fullmovie

metadata.Plot: Marty Mackenzie is an unsuccessful stage actor who takes an interest in private investigating. He takes a job working with Jack Potter, a crusty private eye. They both take a case in Beaver Ridge, a seedy small town where a murder is being planned against a rich gravel pit owner. Marty realizes that private investigating is not as it seemed to be.
metadata.Writer: Billy Bob Thornton, Tom Epperson, Karl Schanzer
metadata.Actors: Leslie Nielsen, Lochlyn Munro, Vanessa Angel
